metadata.description: General Order from President Manuel L. Quezon issued by Major General Valdes awarding four members of the United States navy (Lieutenant John D. Bulkeley, Ensign George E. Cox, Jr., Torpedoman First Class John L. Houlihan, and Chief Torpedoman James D. Light) the Distinguished Conduct Star of the Philippines dated April 15, 1942
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; official papers
metadata.title: General Order No. 1 from President Manuel L. Quezon awarding four members of the United States Navy the Distinguished Conduct Star of the Philippines
